Psalms 136:1.en:
Praise the LORD; for He is good,
His steadfast love is eternal.
Psalms 136:1.he: הוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

Psalms 30:10.en:
“What is to be gained from my death,
from my descent into the Pit?
Can dust praise You?
Can it declare Your faithfulness?
Psalms 30:10.he: מַה־בֶּ֥צַע בְּדָמִי֮ בְּרִדְתִּ֢י אֶ֫ל־שָׁ֥חַת הֲיוֹדְךָ֥ עָפָ֑ר הֲיַגִּ֥יד אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃

Psalms 30:11.en:
Hear, O LORD, and have mercy on me;
O LORD, be my help!”

Psalms 30:12.en:
You turned my lament into dancing,
you undid my sackcloth and girded me with joy,
Psalms 30:12.he: הָפַ֣כְתָּ מִסְפְּדִי֮ לְמָח֢וֹל לִ֥֫י פִּתַּ֥חְתָּ שַׂקִּ֑י וַֽתְּאַזְּרֵ֥נִי שִׂמְחָֽה׃

Psalms 30:13.en:
that [my] whole being might sing hymns to You endlessly;
O LORD my God, I will praise You forever.
Psalms 30:13.he: לְמַ֤עַן ׀ יְזַמֶּרְךָ֣ כָ֭בוֹד וְלֹ֣א יִדֹּ֑ם יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י לְעוֹלָ֥ם אוֹדֶֽךָּ׃ {פ}

Psalms 30:3.en:
O LORD, my God,
I cried out to You,
and You healed me.

Psalms 30:4.en:
O LORD, You brought me up from Sheol,
preserved me from going down into the Pit.
Psalms 30:4.he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה הֶעֱלִ֣יתָ מִן־שְׁא֣וֹל נַפְשִׁ֑י חִ֝יִּיתַ֗נִי (מיורדי) [מִיׇּֽרְדִי־]בֽוֹר׃

Psalms 30:5.en:
O you faithful of the LORD, sing to Him,
and praise His holy name.
Psalms 30:5.he: זַמְּר֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה חֲסִידָ֑יו וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ לְזֵ֣כֶר קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃

Psalms 30:6.en:
For He is angry but a moment,
and when He is pleased there is life.
One may lie down weeping at nightfall;
but at dawn there are shouts of joy.
Psalms 30:6.he: כִּ֤י רֶ֨גַע ׀ בְּאַפּוֹ֮ חַיִּ֢ים בִּרְצ֫וֹנ֥וֹ בָּ֭עֶרֶב יָלִ֥ין בֶּ֗כִי וְלַבֹּ֥קֶר רִנָּֽה׃

Psalms 30:7.en:
When I was untroubled,
I thought, “I shall never be shaken,”

Psalms 30:8.en:
for You, O LORD, when You were pleased,
made [me] firm as a mighty mountain.
When You hid Your face,
I was terrified.
Psalms 30:8.he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה בִּרְצוֹנְךָ֮ הֶעֱמַ֢דְתָּה לְֽהַרְרִ֫י־עֹ֥ז הִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ פָנֶ֗יךָ הָיִ֥יתִי נִבְהָֽל׃

Psalms 30:9.en:
I called to You, O LORD;
to my Lord I made appeal,

Psalms 33:1.en:
Sing forth, O you righteous, to the LORD;
it is fit that the upright acclaim Him.
Psalms 33:1.he: רַנְּנ֣וּ צַ֭דִּיקִים בַּֽיהֹוָ֑ה לַ֝יְשָׁרִ֗ים נָאוָ֥ה תְהִלָּֽה׃

Psalms 33:20.en:
We set our hope on the LORD,
He is our help and shield;
Psalms 33:20.he: נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ חִכְּתָ֣ה לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה עֶזְרֵ֖נוּ וּמָגִנֵּ֣נוּ הֽוּא׃

Psalms 33:21.en:
in Him our hearts rejoice,
for in His holy name we trust.
Psalms 33:21.he: כִּי־ב֭וֹ יִשְׂמַ֣ח לִבֵּ֑נוּ כִּ֤י בְשֵׁ֖ם קׇדְשׁ֣וֹ בָטָֽחְנוּ׃

Psalms 33:22.en:
May we enjoy, O LORD, Your faithful care,
as we have put our hope in You.
Psalms 33:22.he: יְהִי־חַסְדְּךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֣ה עָלֵ֑ינוּ כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר יִחַ֥לְנוּ לָֽךְ׃ {פ}

Psalms 33:3.en:
sing Him a new song;
play sweetly with shouts of joy.
Psalms 33:3.he: שִֽׁירוּ־ל֭וֹ שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ הֵיטִ֥יבוּ נַ֝גֵּ֗ן בִּתְרוּעָֽה׃

Psalms 67:1.en: For the leader; with instrumental music. A psalm. A song.

Psalms 67:2.en:
May God be gracious to us and bless us;
may He show us favor, selah
Psalms 67:2.he: אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים יְחׇנֵּ֥נוּ וִיבָרְכֵ֑נוּ יָ֤אֵֽר פָּנָ֖יו אִתָּ֣נוּ סֶֽלָה׃

Psalms 67:3.en:
that Your way be known on earth,
Your deliverance among all nations.

Psalms 67:4.en:
Peoples will praise You, O God;
all peoples will praise You.
Psalms 67:4.he: יוֹד֖וּךָ עַמִּ֥ים <small>׀</small> אֱלֹהִ֑ים י֝וֹד֗וּךָ עַמִּ֥ים כֻּלָּֽם׃

Psalms 67:5.en:
Nations will exult and shout for joy,
for You rule the peoples with equity,
You guide the nations of the earth. Selah.
Psalms 67:5.he: יִ֥שְׂמְח֥וּ וִירַנְּנ֗וּ לְאֻ֫מִּ֥ים כִּֽי־תִשְׁפֹּ֣ט עַמִּ֣ים מִישֹׁ֑ר וּלְאֻמִּ֓ים ׀ בָּאָ֖רֶץ תַּנְחֵ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃

Psalms 67:6.en:
The peoples will praise You, O God;
all peoples will praise You.
Psalms 67:6.he: יוֹד֖וּךָ עַמִּ֥ים <small>׀</small> אֱלֹהִ֑ים י֝וֹד֗וּךָ עַמִּ֥ים כֻּלָּֽם׃

Psalms 67:7.en:
May the earth yield its produce;
may God, our God, bless us.
Psalms 67:7.he: אֶ֭רֶץ נָתְנָ֣ה יְבוּלָ֑הּ יְ֝בָרְכֵ֗נוּ אֱלֹהִ֥ים אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃

Psalms 67:8.en:
May God bless us,
and be revered to the ends of the earth.
Psalms 67:8.he: יְבָרְכֵ֥נוּ אֱלֹהִ֑ים וְיִֽירְא֥וּ א֝וֹת֗וֹ כׇּל־אַפְסֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃ {פ}

Psalms 68:2.en:
God will arise,
His enemies shall be scattered,
His foes shall flee before Him.
Psalms 68:2.he: יָק֣וּם אֱ֭לֹהִים יָפ֣וּצוּ אוֹיְבָ֑יו וְיָנ֥וּסוּ מְ֝שַׂנְאָ֗יו מִפָּנָֽיו׃

Psalms 68:35.en:
Ascribe might to God,
whose majesty is over Israel,
whose might is in the skies.
Psalms 68:35.he: תְּנ֥וּ עֹ֗ז לֵאלֹ֫הִ֥ים עַֽל־יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל גַּאֲוָת֑וֹ וְ֝עֻזּ֗וֹ בַּשְּׁחָקִֽים׃

Psalms 68:36.en:
You are awesome, O God, in Your holy places;
it is the God of Israel who gives might and power to the people.
Blessed is God.
Psalms 68:36.he: נ֤וֹרָ֥א אֱלֹהִ֗ים מִֽמִּקְדָּ֫שֶׁ֥יךָ אֵ֤ל יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל ה֤וּא נֹתֵ֨ן ׀ עֹ֖ז וְתַעֲצֻמ֥וֹת לָעָ֗ם בָּר֥וּךְ אֱלֹהִֽים׃ {פ}

Psalms 94:1.en:
God of retribution, LORD,
God of retribution, appear!

Psalms 94:2.en:
Rise up, judge of the earth,
give the arrogant their deserts!
Psalms 94:2.he: הִ֭נָּשֵׂא שֹׁפֵ֣ט הָאָ֑רֶץ הָשֵׁ֥ב גְּ֝מ֗וּל עַל־גֵּאִֽים׃

Psalms 96:1.en:
Sing to the LORD a new song,
sing to the LORD, all the earth.
Psalms 96:1.he: שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהֹוָה שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ שִׁ֥ירוּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

en:
Sing to the LORD a new song,
sing to the LORD, all the earth.

Sing to the LORD, bless His name,
proclaim His victory day after day.

Tell of His glory among the nations,
His wondrous deeds, among all peoples.

For the LORD is great and much acclaimed,
He is held in awe by all divine beings.

All the gods of the peoples are mere idols,
but the LORD made the heavens.

Glory and majesty are before Him;
strength and splendor are in His temple.

Ascribe to the LORD, O families of the peoples,
ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.

Ascribe to the LORD the glory of His name,
bring tribute and enter His courts.

Bow down to the LORD majestic in holiness;
tremble in His presence, all the earth!

Declare among the nations, “The LORD is king!”
the world stands firm; it cannot be shaken;
He judges the peoples with equity.

Let the heavens rejoice and the earth exult;
let the sea and all within it thunder,

the fields and everything in them exult;
then shall all the trees of the forest shout for joy

at the presence of the LORD, for He is coming,
for He is coming to rule the earth;
He will rule the world justly,
and its peoples in faithfulness.
he: שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהֹוָה שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ שִׁ֥ירוּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃
שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהֹוָה בָּרְכ֣וּ שְׁמ֑וֹ בַּשְּׂר֥וּ מִיּֽוֹם־לְ֝י֗וֹם יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃
כִּ֥י גָ֘ד֤וֹל יְהֹוָ֣ה וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל מְאֹ֑ד נוֹרָ֥א ה֝֗וּא עַל־כׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃
כִּ֤י ׀ כׇּל־אֱלֹהֵ֣י הָעַמִּ֣ים אֱלִילִ֑ים וַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם עָשָֽׂה׃
הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת עַמִּ֑ים הָב֥וּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כָּב֥וֹד וָעֹֽז׃
הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה כְּב֣וֹד שְׁמ֑וֹ שְׂאֽוּ־מִ֝נְחָ֗ה וּבֹ֥אוּ לְחַצְרוֹתָֽיו׃
הִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה בְּהַדְרַת־קֹ֑דֶשׁ חִ֥ילוּ מִ֝פָּנָ֗יו כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃
אִמְר֤וּ בַגּוֹיִ֨ם ׀ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה מָלָ֗ךְ אַף־תִּכּ֣וֹן תֵּ֭בֵל בַּל־תִּמּ֑וֹט יָדִ֥ין עַ֝מִּ֗ים בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃
יִשְׂמְח֣וּ הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם וְתָגֵ֣ל הָאָ֑רֶץ יִֽרְעַ֥ם הַ֝יָּ֗ם וּמְלֹאֽוֹ׃
יַעֲלֹ֣ז שָׂ֭דַי וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־בּ֑וֹ אָ֥ז יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ כׇּל־עֲצֵי־יָֽעַר׃
לִפְנֵ֤י יְהֹוָ֨ה ׀ כִּ֬י בָ֗א כִּ֥י בָא֮ לִשְׁפֹּ֢ט הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ יִשְׁפֹּֽט־תֵּבֵ֥ל בְּצֶ֑דֶק וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים בֶּאֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ {פ}

en:
Sing to the LORD a new song,
sing to the LORD, all the earth.

Sing to the LORD, bless His name,
proclaim His victory day after day.
he: שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהֹוָה שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ שִׁ֥ירוּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃
שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהֹוָה בָּרְכ֣וּ שְׁמ֑וֹ בַּשְּׂר֥וּ מִיּֽוֹם־לְ֝י֗וֹם יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃

en:
Let the heavens rejoice and the earth exult;
let the sea and all within it thunder,

the fields and everything in them exult;
then shall all the trees of the forest shout for joy

at the presence of the LORD, for He is coming,
for He is coming to rule the earth;
He will rule the world justly,
and its peoples in faithfulness.
he: יִשְׂמְח֣וּ הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם וְתָגֵ֣ל הָאָ֑רֶץ יִֽרְעַ֥ם הַ֝יָּ֗ם וּמְלֹאֽוֹ׃
יַעֲלֹ֣ז שָׂ֭דַי וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־בּ֑וֹ אָ֥ז יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ כׇּל־עֲצֵי־יָֽעַר׃
לִפְנֵ֤י יְהֹוָ֨ה ׀ כִּ֬י בָ֗א כִּ֥י בָא֮ לִשְׁפֹּ֢ט הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ יִשְׁפֹּֽט־תֵּבֵ֥ל בְּצֶ֑דֶק וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים בֶּאֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ {פ}

Psalms 96:3.en:
Tell of His glory among the nations,
His wondrous deeds, among all peoples.

Psalms 96:4.en:
For the LORD is great and much acclaimed,
He is held in awe by all divine beings.
Psalms 96:4.he: כִּ֥י גָ֘ד֤וֹל יְהֹוָ֣ה וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל מְאֹ֑ד נוֹרָ֥א ה֝֗וּא עַל־כׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

Psalms 96:5.en:
All the gods of the peoples are mere idols,
but the LORD made the heavens.
Psalms 96:5.he: כִּ֤י ׀ כׇּל־אֱלֹהֵ֣י הָעַמִּ֣ים אֱלִילִ֑ים וַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם עָשָֽׂה׃

Psalms 96:6.en:
Glory and majesty are before Him;
strength and splendor are in His temple.

Psalms 96:7.en:
Ascribe to the LORD, O families of the peoples,
ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.
Psalms 96:7.he: הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת עַמִּ֑ים הָב֥וּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כָּב֥וֹד וָעֹֽז׃

Psalms 96:8.en:
Ascribe to the LORD the glory of His name,
bring tribute and enter His courts.
Psalms 96:8.he: הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה כְּב֣וֹד שְׁמ֑וֹ שְׂאֽוּ־מִ֝נְחָ֗ה וּבֹ֥אוּ לְחַצְרוֹתָֽיו׃
